summary: I showed my friend (who is a lesbian) Cyrus coming out to Jonah and she legit teared up and got super emotional even though...
question: I showed my friend (who is a lesbian) Cyrus coming out to Jonah and she legit teared up and got super emotional even though she'd never seen a second of this show before. Cyrus is truly just that powerful and it makes my bi heart so happy that his coming out is there for kids growing up right now and also for those of us in our 20s who really just spent so long hoping for but never receiving representation
answer: Representation is obviously important, but so is validation. And I feel like a lot of the shows that are giving us more representation these days are great but they don’t really convey the same sense of validation as Andi Mack does. The fact that we never see characters as victims for what makes them different. The fact that this is a children’s show on Disney Channel - and we previously thought it was impossible to have the word “gay” said on that network. The fact that the cast is entirely made up of actual allies to the lgbtq+ community. All of that goes into making this show validating for those of us who didn’t have that kind of thing when we were younger. And I think that those things also come across even in the smallest scenes. If we didn’t have this particular cast and crew working on telling this story, I’m not sure it would have had the same impact. I am so thankful for the validation and representation they are providing, and it warms my heart to know that it can have that much of an effect on people who don’t even know abut the show as a whole. Beautiful.

I am so thankful for the validation and representation they are providing, and it warms my heart to know that it can have that much of an effect on people who don’t even know abut the show as a whole. Beautiful.

All of that goes into making this show validating for those of us who didn’t have that kind of thing when we were younger. And I think that those things also come across even in the smallest scenes. I am so thankful for the validation and representation they are providing, and it warms my heart to know that it can have that much of an effect on people who don’t even know abut the show as a whole. Beautiful.

summary: every time i watch the coming out scene my heart ends up in my throat and it’s always beating really fast. partly because of...
body: every time i watch the coming out scene my heart ends up in my throat and it’s always beating really fast. partly because of pride and happiness and partly because i know it’s something i still have to do but don’t have the courage to do. but cyrus gives me a little bit more courage each time i see the scene. im overjoyed how accessible and open this show is. im over the moon about it. it continues to help me even though im an adult.

summary: Should I Write A Fan Fic
body:
Should I Write A Fan Fic

Kind of want to write the LONGEST Tyrus fan fiction because I have some good ideas. Should I full send it and do it. Obviously, I’d have background Ambi, and Muffy. And some other important stuff, but also cute Tyrus fluff. Also Kippen Siblings would reign in this too… no matter what.

summary: WHY DO I STILL FREAK OUT EVERYTIME I WATCH CYRUS SAY "I'M GAY" LIKE WTF OMGGGG?!!! 🤣🤣
question: WHY DO I STILL FREAK OUT EVERYTIME I WATCH CYRUS SAY "I'M GAY" LIKE WTF OMGGGG?!!! 🤣🤣
answer: I don’t necessarily freak out when I watch it but sometimes I’ll just be sitting there doing nothing and I’ll suddenly think about it and that’s when I really freak out. Like watching it makes me happy obviously but when I’m alone with nothing but my thoughts and that enters my mind? Whew, I get overwhelmed and lose the ability to function for a few minutes.

reblog.comment: I don’t necessarily freak out when I watch it but sometimes I’ll just be sitting there doing nothing and I’ll suddenly think about it and that’s when I really freak out. Like watching it makes me happy obviously but when I’m alone with nothing but my thoughts and that enters my mind? Whew, I get overwhelmed and lose the ability to function for a few minutes.

summary: I’ve been trying to imagine what his dance/pose thing would look like for the intro theme song credits & this is what I’ve come...
body:
Since my brain already sees TJ as a main character

I’ve been trying to imagine what his dance/pose thing would look like for the intro theme song credits & this is what I’ve come up with:

  • Him doing this sort of awkward teen boi pose
  • Him miming a basketball shot
  • & then him pointing at the camera with one hand & smiling


Feel free to add on, I’m curious what other people imagine it’d be like!

summary: I'm at a party and we were talking about Disney and I was telling everyone about Andi Mack and I showed them Cyrus' "I'm gay"...
